name: multiscale

effect.black_white: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.

short_effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.

flavor_text.black_white: Reduces damage when HP is full.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Reduces damage when HP is full.
